import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import {useLocation} from "react-router-dom" const ChatRoom=()=>{ const location=useLocation() const[data,setData]=useState({}) useEffect(()=> { setData(location.data) },[location]) return(

{data?.room} Chat Room

Ishaan 2-minutes ago

Hello There

Hello There

) } export default ChatRoom
